THE FOLLOWING COLLECTIONS OR PIOUS LITTLE TREATISES, TOGETHER WITH THE RVLE OF S. CLARE AND DECLARAT
1. A TABLE OF THE CONTENTS IN THE ENSUING BOOK.

1. TO THE READER.
Imprimatur actum in Vicariatu Andomarenſi, die tertiâ Novembris 1684.De Mandato B. DE LARRE Secret.
#####Body#####
